page.title: 20Activities for Children
page.content: {The infants swim}in Kentisbeare school pool whereas the juniors travel to Clyst Hydon pool.Many children enjoy {athletics}and win certificates.Some also play{cricket and rounders.}Boys are particularly keen on{BMX bicycles and break_dancing.Several girls enjoy {cricket, volleyball}and going to discos. Television remains a favourite pastime as does playing games on {computers. Chess}has been popular and younger children play chase, sticky glue, Shirley Temple and stringers. It is true that hopscotch remains an interest. It is probably true that children walk less than they did and also that they have not really become involved in the{Cullompton Sports Centre.}Many organisations cater for their needs.
